products.name: Ocean Cleanser
products.brandedName: Osea Ocean Cleanser
products.description: What it is: A refreshing, mineral-rich seaweed cleansing gel for clean, energized and balanced skin.What it does: Wake up your skin and your senses. This seaweed-infused gel cleanser removes everything from surface impurities to excess oils. The pH-balanced formula gently exfoliates to unclog pores without stripping skin. It delivers mineral-rich hydration for a radiant complexion you can see and feel.Key ingredients:- Undaria seaweed: rich in amino acids, antioxidants and nutrients to mineralize the skin- Bentonite: a natural smectite clay that works to remove surface impurities and excess oils to detoxify and unclog pores without stripping skin- Lactic acid: gently exfoliates skin- Glycerin: gently moisturizes, smoothes and hydrates- Nourishing oil blend: a blend of jojoba and sesame oils, rich in essential vitamins, nourishes and moisturizes the skinResearch results:In a third-party consumer perception study conducted over 1 week on 33 women, ages 30 to 59:Immediately after 1 use:- 100% agreed skin looked balanced and clean- 100% agreed skin felt hydrated and refreshed- 97% agreed it cleansed pores and didn't strip skinAfter 1 week of use:- 100% agreed skin looked healthier- 97% agreed skin looked more radiant- 97% agreed skin felt softerHow to use: Apply the face cleanser to damp skin and rinse with warm water. Layer with preferred OSEA serum, facial oil and moisturizer. Use morning and night. Natural Beauty & Wellness products are free of sulfates, phthalates, parabens, petrochemicals, mineral oil, silicone and talc Cruelty-free Made in the USA

products.description: The Canvas Large Tote is a carryall that’s ready for an overnight, a plane ride or a day at the office. Crafted from textural cotton canvas, this silhouette is intended to fade and relax over time for an authentically broken-in look that Marc himself loves to wear. This spacious tote features a chunky top-sip closure, namesake branding, multiple inside pockets, sturdy top handles and room for anything you might need. Carry yours by the top handles or wear over your shoulder.
products.aiDescription: Looking for a stylish and practical tote bag? Look no further than the Marc Jacobs Large Tote Bag in classic black. This women's bag is the perfect choice for any fashion-forward adult who needs a reliable carryall for everyday use. With its sturdy canvas construction and zip closure, this tote is both durable and secure. Plus, it's roomy enough to hold all your essentials and more. Whether you're heading to work, running errands, or traveling, the Marc Jacobs Large Tote Bag is the ultimate accessory for any woman on the go.

Opulently shimmering floral lace decorates every inch, flaring out in dimensional godets at the hem for increased dynamic movement. Accent the sparkling stunner with crystal stud earrings or a soft necklace that lays across your collarbones. Finish the look with a metallic-hued heel that's comfortable enough to dance in all night long.
products.aiDescription: This R & M Richards Off-The-Shoulder Lace Gown is a must-have for any fashion-savvy woman. The opulent floral lace shimmers with every movement, while the shoulder-baring neckline frames the face beautifully. The gown flares out in dimensional godets at the hem, adding dynamic movement to your every step. Pair it with crystal stud earrings or a soft necklace for a touch of elegance, and finish the look with a metallic-hued heel that's comfortable enough to dance in all night long. Macy's is the perfect store to find this stunning dress.

These black and white leather boots are perfect for any fashion-conscious woman. With an almond toe, slip-on style, and pull tab at the rear, these boots are both practical and fashionable. Whether you're dressing up for a night out or running errands around town, these boots are the perfect choice for any occasion. Shop now at Farfetch and step up your shoe game!

products.name: Peptides & Antioxidants Firming Daily Treatment
products.brandedName: ALLIES OF SKIN Peptides & Antioxidants Firming Daily Treatment
products.description: Peptides & Antioxidants Firming Daily Treatment Peptides & Antioxidants Firming Daily Treatment Peptides & Antioxidants Firming Daily Treatment by Allies of Skin is a daily leave-on treatment supercharged with multiple Peptides, 7 Brighteners, 9 Antioxidants and a 16.5% Repair Complex to stimulate collagen production, help repair damaged skin and reduce all signs of premature aging.This powerful time-release formula features a balanced pH level of 5.0-5.4 and contains the concentration of a treatment mask combined with the ease of a moisturizer. The next-generation blend of Palmitoyl Tripeptide-8 and Marrubium Vulgare Extract, which are supercharged with Antioxidants Glutathione, Thiotaine and Spin Trap, helps repair tired, damaged skin while defending it against all forms of environmental stressors, while fat-soluble Vitamin C, Teprenone and Palmitoyl Tripeptide-5 reduce the appearance of dark spots, large pores and wrinkles.With daily use, production of collagen is boosted and the cellular health of skin is prolonged, for healthy skin that performs and looks at its best.. Ideal for normal skin. Vegan & cruelty-free. Free of Parabens, Sulfates, Synthetic Dyes & Fragrances, Alcohol, Silicone, Propylene Glycol, Polyethylene Glycol, PEGs-numbered, GMOs, Triclosan, Phthalates, Mineral Oil, Petroleum, Isopropyl Palmitate, Isopropyl Myristate and Retinyl Palmitate. 50 ml. After cleansing and before applying serum, apply all over face and neck. If using a facial oil, mix a few drops of oil with the day cream to apply in one easy step. Use daily, AM/PM. ASKI-WU12. PPADT050EN01. Allies of Skin is a multi-functional skincare collection that was founded with a simple goal in mind: to create smart, effective products for the modern multi-hyphenate using potent antioxidants, probiotics and a smorgasbord of nutrients, which supercharge the skin's ability to correct itself. Each product has been designed to effortlessly complement all aspects of a demanding life.

products.description: Reset Cooling Gel Conditioner Reset Cooling Gel Conditioner Give your scalp a breath of fresh air with amika Reset Cooling Gel Conditioner. This invigorating, cooling conditioner delivers lightweight hydration and nourishment. Pink Clay & Charcoal absorb dirt ridding pores of toxins and odors, while gently exfoliating dead skin cells. Indian Cress Stem Extract and refreshing Menthol cools and enriches hair with vitamins and antioxidants to promote oxygen flow for a balanced, healthy scalp.. Safe for color-treated, Brazilian-treated and keratin-treated hair. Cruelty-free. Free of Sulfates, Parabens, Phthalates, Gluten, Mineral Oil, MIT/MCIT and Artificial Colors. 6.7 oz. May be used alone or as a system with the other amika Reset products. AIKA-WU130. AM50.18333. Amika is committed to curating haircare and styling tools fit for a lifestyle of self-expression and rebellion against conformity and the mundane. Founded by industry outsiders in Williamsburg, Brooklyn in 2007, amika is the antithesis of a typical beauty brand. Instead of purveying unattainable perfection, amika believes in an evolving and totally individual version of beauty. The result is a culture of inclusion and positivity, all while injecting a sunny disposition into haircare.

products.name: Athletic Propulsion Labs (APL) Techloom Phantom (Black/White/Melange) Women's Shoes
products.brandedName: Athletic Propulsion Labs (APL) Techloom Phantom (Black/White/Melange) Women's Shoes
products.unbrandedName: Athletic Propulsion Labs (APL) Techloom Phantom (Black/White/Melange) Women's Shoes
products.description: The primary materials that compose this product contain a minimum of 20 percent recycled content. Stay fresh and stylish with these gorgeous sneakers from Athletic Propulsion Labs (APL)! 3D Stretch TechLoom upper features an intricate grid pattern designed to move with your feet. Lace-up closure connected through hidden eyelets. Slip-on construction. Vegan construction. Brand name logo hardware featured at the center of the tongue. Rounded toe silhouette. Upper composed of 68% recycled polyester certified by Global Recycled Standard (GRS). Soft textile lining. Lightly cushioned textile footbed. PropeliumÂ® midsole/outsole compound developed for direct ground contact, which allows for less rubber on the outsole. This reduces shoe weight in a significant manner. Propelium has been designed for maximizing energy generation, providing incredible comfort which will support midsole structural integrity longer than conventional EVA. Imported. Measurements: Weight: 7 oz Product measurements were taken using size 8, width B - Medium. Please note that measurements may vary by size.

products.name: Women's Gosia One-Shoulder Gown - Dark Royal - Size 8

products.unbrandedName: Women's Gosia One-Shoulder Gown - Dark Royal - Size 8
products.description: ONLY AT SAKS. A floral detail sits atop the shoulder of this asymmetric ruched gown. One-shoulder Sleeveless Pull-on style Keyhole detail at shoulder Ruched hip Wrap skirt Polyamide/elastane Hand wash Made in Italy SIZE & FIT Mermaid silhouette About 65" from shoulder to hem Model measurements: 5'10" tall, 32" bust, 23" waist, 34" hips Model is wearing a US size 4 ABOUT THE BRAND Self-taught designer Chiara Boni began her career creating ready-to-wear for several Italian labels before launching Chiara Boni La Petite Robe in 2007. With a focus on flattering the female form, her elegant and versatile styles have gained a loyal following. Dress Collections - La Petite Robe Di Chiara > Chiara Boni La Petite Robe > Saks Fifth Avenue > Barneys. Chiara Boni La Petite Robe. Color: Dark Royal. Size: 8.
products.aiDescription: Introducing the Gosia One-Shoulder Gown by Chiara Boni La Petite Robe, available exclusively at Saks Fifth Avenue. This stunning gown features a beautiful floral detail on the shoulder, adding a touch of elegance to the asymmetrical ruched design. With its one-shoulder style and pull-on convenience, this gown is both fashionable and easy to wear. The keyhole detail at the shoulder and ruched hip enhance the overall look, while the wrap skirt adds a feminine touch. Made in Italy from polyamide and elastane, this gown is hand washable for easy care. The mermaid silhouette and 65" length create a flattering and glamorous look. Perfect for any special occasion, this gown is a must-have for any fashion-forward woman.

products.aiDescription: Make a grand entrance with the Georgina One-Shoulder Crepe Gown from Dress the Population. This stunning dress features a one-shoulder neckline and a form-fitting silhouette that will turn heads. The crepe fabric drapes beautifully, and the front slit adds a touch of allure. products.name: Riley High Rise Straight Crop
products.brandedName: AGOLDE Riley High Rise Straight Crop
products.description: Riley High Rise Straight Crop Riley High Rise Straight Crop 100% cotton. Made in USA. Machine wash. Button fly. 5-pocket design. Intentionally distressed detail. Light fading and whiskering throughout. 14 at the knee narrows to 13 at the leg opening. AGOL-WJ135. A056B 811. Based in downtown Los Angeles, AGOLDE is a premium denim label dedicated to highlighting youth culture throughout the decades. Instead of simply replicating your favorite styles from the past, they set out to recreate them with a contemporary approach in mind. The styles may emit an irreverent attitude, but AGOLDE is serious when it comes to quality. They use only the most innovative fabrics sourced from around the world and facilitate all product development to create denim of the highest caliber.
